title: Luxury House for sale- Asgiriya ,Kandy
details:
Newly built brand new house, Close to all main towns. 1.8 Km to Kandy, 1.6 Km to Katugastota, 2.5 Km to Peradeniya.
Close by Gateway International College, Spring Field International College, Trinity College,Girls’ High School.
Ideal for tourism/ eco -tourism.
Overlooking Mahaweli River.• Descent ,quiet residential area
